org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.util.anttask
Class HtmlToMarkupTask

java.lang.Object
  Task
      org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.util.anttask.MarkupTask
          org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.util.anttask.HtmlToMarkupTask

public class HtmlToMarkupTask
extends MarkupTask

An Ant task to generate wiki markup from HTML sources. For best results ensure that jsoup is on the classpath.

Since:
1.6
Author:
David Green

execute

public void execute()

Throws:
BuildException

getOutputFilenameFormat

public String getOutputFilenameFormat()
The format of the HTML output file. Consists of a pattern where the '$1' is replaced with the filename of the input file, $2 is replaced with the markup language name (in lower-case). Default value is $1.$2

setOutputFilenameFormat

public void setOutputFilenameFormat(String outputFilenameFormat)
The format of the HTML output file. Consists of a pattern where the '$1' is replaced with the filename of the input file, $2 is replaced with the markup language name (in lower-case). Default value is $1.$2

isOverwrite

public boolean isOverwrite()
indicate if target files should be overwritten even if their timestamps are newer than the source files.
